Conversely, I could have a very tight group of close friends, and feel very little loneliness despite my network being small.

reply_context.text: Loneliness is an emotion. It's not a mathematical property of my social network structure, it's a quality of my subjective experience. I can have lots of shallow friendships and be socially active, and still have a subjective experience of deep loneliness. 7/n
